Aegis.effect: Reduces damage inflicted by attacks from foes 2 spaces away by 50%.

Aether.effect: Resolve combat as if foe suffered Def/Res-50%. Unit recovers HP = half damage dealt.

Black Luna.effect: Resolve combat as if foe suffered Def/Res-80%. (Skill cannot be inherited.)

Blazing Flame.effect: Before initiating a combat, foes in an area near target take damage equal to unit's 1.5xAtk minus foe's Def or Res.

Blazing Light.effect: Before initiating a combat, foes in an area near target take damage equal to unit's 1.5xAtk minus foe's Def or Res.

Blazing Thunder.effect: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to 1.5 x (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Blazing Wind.effect: Before initiating a combat, foes in an area near target take damage equal to unit's 1.5xAtk minus foe's Def or Res.

Bonfire.effect: Boosts damage dealt by 50% of unit's Def.

Buckler.effect: Reduces damage inflicted by attacks from adjacent foes by 30%.

Chilling Wind.effect: Boosts damage dealt by 50% of unit's Res.

Daylight.effect: Heal 30% of damage dealt in your next attack.

Escutcheon.effect: Reduces damage inflicted by attacks from adjacent foes by 30%.

Galeforce.effect: If this unit initiates an attack, it can take another action after combat. (Once per turn only.)

Glacies.effect: Boosts damage dealt by 80% of unit's Res.

Glowing Ember.effect: Boosts damage dealt by 50% of unit's Def.

Growing Flame.effect: Before initiating a combat, foes in a wide area near target take damage equal to unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res.

Growing Light.effect: Before initiating a combat, foes in a wide area near target take damage equal to unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res.

Growing Thunder.effect: Before initiating a combat, foes in a wide area near target take damage equal to unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res.

Growing Wind.effect: Before initiating a combat, foes in a wide area near target take damage equal to unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res.

Heavenly Light.effect: When healing an ally with a staff, heal every allies HP by 10.

Holy Vestments.effect: Reduces damage inflicted by attacks from foes 2 spaces away by 30%.

Ice Mirror.effect: Reduced damage unit takes from foes 2 spaces away by 30%. If Special triggers, boosts unit's next attack by total damage was reduced (by any source, including other skills). Resets at end of combat.(Skill cannot be inherited.)

Iceberg.effect: Boosts damage dealt by 50% of unit's Res.

Ignis.effect: Boosts damage dealt by 80% of unit's Def.

Imbue.effect: When healing an ally with a staff, increases recovered HP by 10.

Kindled-Fire Balm.effect: When healing an ally with a staff, grants all allies Atk +4 for 1 turn.

Luna.effect: Resolve combat as if foe suffered Def/Res-50%.

Miracle.effect: If HP > 1, survive a lethal attack with 1 HP remaining.

Moonbow.effect: Resolve combat as if foe suffered Def/Res-30%.

New Moon.effect: Resolve combat as if foe suffered Def/Res-30%.

Noontime.effect: Heal 30% of damage dealt in your next attack.

Pavise.effect: Reduces damage inflicted by attacks from adjacent foes by 50%.

Radiant Aether.effect: During combat, treats foe's Def/Res as if reduced by 50%. Restores HP = 50% of damage dealt.

Regnal Astra.effect: Boosts damage dealt by 40% of unit's Spd. (Skill cannot be inherited.)

Reprisal.effect: Grants bonus to damage dealt equal to 30% of damage suffered.

Retribution.effect: Grants bonus to damage dealt equal to 30% of damage suffered.

Rising Flame.effect: Before initiating a combat, foes in an area near target take damage equal to unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res.

Rising Light.effect: Before initiating a combat, foes in an area near target take damage equal to unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res.

Rising Thunder.effect: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res.

Rising Wind.effect: Before initiating a combat, foes in an area near target take damage equal to unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res.

Sacred Cowl.effect: Reduces damage inflicted by attacks from foes 2 spaces away by 30%.

Sol.effect: Heal 50% of damage dealt in your next attack.

Solid-Earth Balm.effect: When healing an ally with a staff, grants all allies Def +4 for 1 turn.

Still-Water Balm.effect: When healing an ally with a staff, grants all allies Res +4 for 1 turn.

Swift-Winds Balm.effect: When healing an ally with a staff, grants all allies Spd +4 for 1 turn.

Vengeance.effect: Grants bonus to damage dealt equal to 50% of damage suffered.
